title: Rihanna is a natural beauty as she steps out makeup-free in sleek monochromatic cream look
text:
She own's her own makeup empire but Rihanna stepped out looking positively flawless au naturale.

The 31-year-old mogul looked as fresh as could be after disembarking from a long international flight when she was spotted at John F. Kennedy International Airport in New York City on Friday.

Ri Ri had been across the pond in England and make an appearance at the Legado x Faberge x Rome de Bellegarde VIP party, hosted at The Vinyl Factory Gallery in London just one night previous.

Stunning! Rihanna looked as fresh as could be after disembarking from a long international flight when she was spotted at John F. Kennedy International Airport in New York City on Friday

The singer appeared cozy yet sleek in a white and cream layered ensemble.

She sported some white sneakers, matching wide-leg sweatpants and a thin tank under a cream jacket with a fluffy wool vest.

Keeping with the monochromatic style, she accessorized with white framed sunglasses and a cream clutch.

Her long wavy locks were left down and parted to the side and her skin glowed without a stitch of her cult-favorite Fenty Beauty makeup.

Style goals: The star managed to make a comfortable airplane look work as a chic ensemble by keeping it monochromatic

Fall glam! She sported some white sneakers, matching wide-leg sweatpants and a thin tank under a cream jacket with a fluffy wool vest

Rihanna seems to be having a moment with the color cream. The night before she swung by a soiree in London wearing the same shade.

The beauty rocked a sportswear inspired look, again opting for an all-white theme with a loose jacket, thigh-skimming miniskirt and matching pointed stilettos.

This month the A-list star is gracing the cover of Vogue magazine where she gave a candid interview about her life.

Breaking style rules: Rihanna proved the old saying that you can't wear white after Labor Day is completely wrong

Flawless: She owns her own makeup empire but Rihanna was positively perfect going au naturale

Accessories: Ri Ri rocked layered gold jewelry, an oversized clutch and sunglasses with white frames

In the piece, the Grammy winner confirmed rumors that she had turned down the coveted Super Bowl halftime show last year in solidarity with Colin Kaepernick.

'I couldn't dare do that,' Rihanna said. 'For what? Who gains from that? Not my people. I just couldn't be a sellout. I couldn't be an enabler.

'There's things within that organization that I do not agree with at all, and I was not about to go and be of service to them in any way.'

Her fall style: Rihanna seems to be having a moment with the color cream on Thursday she swung by a soiree in London wearing the same shade

Her revelation comes after a year of reports claimed she turned down the 2019 halftime gig eventually played by Maroon 5 featuring Big Boi and Travis Scott.

Kaepernick, the now-former San Francisco 49ers quarterback, became a controversial figure during the 2016 season, when he protested inequality and racist police brutality by refusing to stand during the national anthem.

This year Jennifer Lopez and Shakira will co-headline the mid-game extravaganza.
